desc: A layout defines the visual structure for a user interface, such as the UI for an activity or app widget. You can declare a layout in XML. Declare UI elements in XML. Android provides a straightforward XML vocabulary that corresponds to the View classes and subclasses, such as those for widgets and layouts.The advantage to declaring your UI in XML is that it enables you to better separate the presentation of your application from the code that controls its behavior. Your UI descriptions are external to your application code, which means that you can modify or adapt it without having to modify your source code and recompile.Android Layout TypesThere is number of Layouts provided by Android which you will use in almost all the Android applications to provide the different view, look and feel.i.	ConstraintLayoutii.	LinearLayout (Vertical)iii.	LinearLayout(Horizontal)iv.	RelativeLayoutv.	TableLayoutvi.	GridLayoutvii.	FrameLayoutWrite the XMLUsing Android's XML vocabulary, you can quickly design UI layouts and the screen elements they contain, in the same way, you create web pages in HTML — with a series of nested elements. Each layout file must contain exactly one root element, which must be a View or ViewGroup object. Once you've defined the root element, you can add additional layout objects or widgets as child elements to gradually build a View hierarchy that defines your layout.Assignment Description:In this work, you need to write XML codes to demonstrate your understanding of the SEVEN (7) types of layouts. Browse through the Google Play to find your favorite app to redesign the graphic user interface (GUI) with the suitable type of Layout. For each GUI, you need to reference to the original app website address.What do you have to hand in?Project XML Code, a screen print: Provide a single zipped file containing all directories/files in your Android project. Therefore, all classes, source code, resources, manifest file etc will be included. You should also include a screen print of the main opening menu/screen of your app. Include your name in the zipped file name e.g. [url removed, login to view]
title: XML Exercises - Declare UI elements in XML  - 07/12/2017 01:21 EST

desc: Our company manufactures machinery and we would like an app to assist us in remotely diagnosing rare intermittent faults using video without streaming large amounts of data. The app should be continually recording video to a circular buffer of around 30 seconds. The app should continually be checking a designated webpage (at ~3 second intervals). When the last line of the webpage changes, the app should save the PREVIOUS 30 seconds from the buffer and save it to the device (ideally an android phone) with a filename based on the last line from the webpage. The app should also act as a webserver, such that when the device (which will have a fixed wifi ip address) is access from a browser, a webpage containing thumbnails and filenames which link to the associated videos.
title: Build me a video recording Android app

desc: I have a personal project to have a mobile application (iOS and Android)  to help to get the lower price of a certain product offered by different providers based on preferences and location.The idea is that the app will be used by friends. There is not business model defined. It is just a kind of test bed to check how users adopt it.I have already the mockups (around 20)Below detail and characteristics:MobileHybridFacebook or email sign up/sign inPrice to be loaded by lists on Excel or catalogExtract prices from web pagesProfile database (Name, Range or Age +5 years, Preferences by priorization by items: Prefered Area (7 subcategories), Type of Product (3 subcategories), Variety (5 subcategories), Country (3 subcategories), Range of Prices (0-100),  Option to modify the profileSearch barFilters. Same as preferencesTop of the initial user page by preferences without location, middle with location, and bottom special offers. Second page with the selected product considered the minimum price and additionally the rest of prices and stores from low to high price. Also on the bottom, the wines viewed by users additionally to the actual wineGeolocation.  Prices by defined location on the user profile or also by actual location (proximity)Access to the cameraPhoto recognition of brand, type, and additional infoCode picture of the commercial local in order to get the wine detail or manual price introductionCheck in by location on the commercial placePhoto registration with date.Manual product and price registrationSocial network sharingLikes to the prices updated by other users. Points to be awarded to the user who provided the info. User levels by points. First price updated 5 points, with photo 2 points, additional updates 2 points, with out photo 1 point, Likes by others 2 points, shares on social network 2 points, shares to other users 2 pointsOptionals:Users on the app sharing. RecommendationsProduct RatingsPush notifications for prices on the routeAlerts notification with a target price by winePurchasePaymentPick up or deliveryI will be the only owner of source code.Optionals should not be considered on the development if they have an important impact on the effort and cost.Additionally I will require to understand additional costs and cost for new requests or changes.

desc: Project ScopeProject: 		Professional Dog Mom mobile appClient:			Tonda BProject Start Date:	ImmediateOverview:Professional Dog Mom, Tonda Benge, runs a dog service and needs a mobile app for managing her service scheduling, client order management, and in-house service providers (Nanny).Deliverables:1.	Mobile application built with Unity 3D architecture and converted to IOS and Android platform.2.	A backend admin panel will manage the application posting3.	The app will need to have a scheduling mechanism for posting tasks by time and date. The app calendar needs to be able to schedule and view services by week, month, or year. This calendar should be exactly like the calendar in IPhone.4.	When a Nanny is assigned a services project, they will need to select the event from the calendar and acknowledge start when they arrive at the client site. An automatic time and date stamp will be assigned at that time.5.	After completion of the services the Nanny will close out the event by selecting a close event button. This will open a file to attach photos of the event, comments by the Nanny, and an automatic closing time and date stamp. This information, including photos will be sent to the admin panel server and updated to the client account.Milestone 1:Design and develop app functionality and UI/UXMilestone 2:Develop app prototype for client review and acceptanceMilestone 3:Build app in Unity 3D and convert to IOS and Android platformsBuild the database for the hosting serverPromised Delivery Date:	7 January 2018Notes:1.	All intellectual property must be released and received prior to any funds being release by RadiantVRx, LLC2.	No Upfront or Retainer funding is offered. No exceptions3.	All Apps must be tested and approved prior to funding being released by RadiantVRx, LLC4.	Contact: Michael@[url removed, login to view]
title: IOS and Android mobile app built with Unity 3D

desc: PLEASE READ THE PROJECT BEFORE BIDDING !I need to make myself an idea how much would such an app development cost.I am looking for a "PRICE TAG" here for an application that has to be built based on Google Maps.Application would use the GPS signal of the device and the DATA connection (3-4G as available).I need design (very simple , just a menu) and the app built.What the app should do :- App should display Google Maps at all times and the device location on the map.- App should display the moving speed of the device.- User should be able to ADD event on any given location on the map. For example traffic jam , police radar, point of interest for other people , or any other event type specified by developer. The event should be marked on the map with a DOT or other sign. User that adds the event should be able to insert a comment to the event.- ALL the other users of this app should be WARNED of this event type when they are closing on the are in the area (area should be predefined in the app , could be 2-10 miles or km).- ALL the other users should be able to CONFIRM or NEGATE the event type.- When other user click the DOT they should be able to see how many people have confirmed the event and how many negated the existence of the event and also see the initial comment. No other comments than the initial comment can be posted.- Users should be able to select alarm type based on the event.- App should be able to run in the background and send alerts while running in the background. (sonor alert + popup on screen with event type and description)- Event should EXPIRE and disappear if no other user has confirmed the Event within XX minutes.- IF the number of the users that negated the event is bigger than the number of user that acknowledged the event, the event should expire and disappear.All the data (alerts, messages etc.) will be kept on a central server on a SQL database.Other features :- Map should be able to zoom and rotate.- Alert sounds will be predefined by developer.PLEASE READ THE PROJECT BEFORE BIDDING !IF you have NEVER developed an app DO NOT BID !If you do not have portfolio with at least 1 previous developed app , DO NOT BID !I need someone with good knowledge of windows and that understands what the requirements are, do NOT WASTE my time please.When posting bid please do not post bids like  : I can do this, let's work together ! or "I can do it" , you will get ignored.This are just the BASICS of the project, further development will come.I will NOT send any milestone before I see some kind of progress.If the price and the bidders are not satisfactory I will close and re-post the project.
title: Mobile APP for IOS and Andriod based on Google Maps.

desc: I want a simple and a quick creation of a proof of concept app.The app should work / integrate with an already excisting JSON API.My customer has a webapplication which tracks cars, busses, trucks, planes, boats, etc by implementing a GPS box which does updates every 60 sec. and put the location on a map.So the blackbox in the car send an update to their server every 60 sec. and that data can be retrieved by using the API.The webapp is great and should be somekind of responsive, but this doesn't work that great on a phone and thats the reason they want a native app for it.The current app developer is short in time and can't deliver and has not deliver anything yet to my or to my customer, so that is why i am looking for you.What the proof of concept should contain is a simple login page where you can enter the username and password which is created for using the API. When the information is entered correctly it should retrieve all the information about the objects and put them on the map, for an example google maps.With the API, you can retrieve the data if the engine is turned on or off and more, it is nessecary to use this data to create a green or red icon on the map if the car is driving yes or no. All this is should be very simple with the API.The API is well documented and i have a demo account to test.The Proof of concept is just a simple showcase that it can be done and then the app development will start and i will make a full case with the customer about wishes, looks, etc.For now, i need the proof of concept as soon as possible.Information about the API can be found here: [url removed, login to view]
title: Create a app (proof of concept) which uses an excisting JSON API

desc: Please accept my apologies!! My English is really not perfect but I do my best ;) Thank you for understanding;)I am seeking a way to build an app good for iOS, Android, any type of tablet and also computer (Web) used too.I have seen a (limited) version of what I am hoping to put together done with an app builder called GoodBarber.Let me present you some of the spec’s wanted in my app. I’ll obviously will provide more details in time, but you’ll be able to tell me if or how or whit what kind of help I can get to my goals. There are three phases in the project.Phase one:The app will have many users, that will have profiles built to give them different type of access to the content of the app. (We will have management, employees and suppliers using the app). They will not be granted the same access in the app, depending on the level of access they are allowed.The app will need a section with a users repertory. Users will be able to search other users by name or by keywords. (Like the job title or functions). Again, if possible, not all users will be granted to see the complete list of the repertory. (That specific thing, I could survive if not possible). When the user is found. The user's phone numbers should be ready to dial in one clic.It would be great to locate our connected users on a map.Need to create a messaging system with different groups with different levels of messaging. (Level one can access all users of any groups, level two some specific groups and on).I need to create a section where some users will create one ore more specific events, that will be transmitted to people of the group or groups the user is programmed to reach. If possible, each of the events should offer the possibility to be updated in real time by any of the reached users.Again, if possible. It would be nice to have a way to notify all the concerned users (Push notifications) as updates are done.In the same section. I would need my users to be able to add some files or pictures to their posts. In real time it could provide very good infos the the rest of the team.All of my requested data needs to be archived and ideally printed by an admin user.Each user has some degree of responsibility. The users responsibilities need to be reached through his profile and also through the event he was notified. (If that is possible). Those would just be PDF files that could be printed.This whole thing is intended to give access to crucial specific informations dedicated to key people needed in special situations.
title: PWA for a specific group of users.
